channel.title: Cita on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Cita on Simba Tango

item.title: Technological advances in tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ carrotcreative I have to say I feel a bit like an oldie, writing this, but I am kind of old-school when it comes to tango, so I guess that’s ok.. I can’t help but notice how many things have changed since I first started with tango. Not the dance itself, but things around it. Technological changes that the newcomers in tango seem to take for granted, were simply not available only a few years back.
